data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Seung-Gyu, Ahn, Kee-Jeong (2016): A taxonomic review of Korean Liogluta Thomson (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Aleocharinae) with descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 4193 (2): 285-303, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4193.2.5|45 occurrences
